segments.text: Shall we go to cinema this evening ? The new blockbuster starring mel gibson is showing . It ’ s supposed to be really good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of movie is it ? I don ’ t like many of his movies , actually .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s a thriller . It has Julia Roberts playing the female lead .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like thrillers and I like Julia Roberts , so it might be interesting . I read a review today and the critic didn ’ t seem to be very impressed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He didn ’ t say it was bad , but he said that it wasn ’ t as good as it could have been , particularly as there were some good actors and actresses in it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The movie starts at eight o ’ clock , so we have plenty of time to eat and get ready .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Dinner is nearly ready and I ’ d like to watch the news before we go . The Oscars were last night and I want to see the results .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I won ’ t spoil your enjoyment by telling you who won . There were a few surprises .
segments.speaker: S1
